mapper.select: SELECT r.id,r.uid,r.pcnt,r.price,r.totalprice,t.id AS ticketid,t.sid,t.seatid,s.mid,s.sdate,s.tid,m.title,m.releasedate,ds.starttime from reservation r INNER JOIN ticket t ON r.id = t.rid INNER JOIN schedules s ON t.sid = s.id INNER JOIN movie m ON s.mid =m.id INNER JOIN detail_schedules ds ON t.sid = ds.sid WHERE r.id= #{id}

SELECT r.id, r.uid, t.sid, s.sdate, ds.starttime, ds.endtime, m.title from schedules s INNER JOIN ticket t ON t.sid = s.id INNER JOIN reservation r ON t.rid = r.id INNER JOIN detail_schedules ds ON ds.sid = s.id INNER JOIN movie m ON m.id = s.mid WHERE r.uid = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET uid=#{uid}, pcnt=#{pcnt}, price=#{price}, totalprice=#{totalprice} WHERE id=#{id}
